meanings.definition: A unit of electrical resistance equal to one millionth of an ohm.
meanings.sent1: I measured the resistance of the circuit in microhms.
meanings.sent2: The multimeter displayed a reading in microhms.
meanings.sent3: Why did the electron bring a tiny ohm to the microhm party?
meanings.sent4: The flow of current through the wire was slower than a snail in a microhm.
meanings.sent5: The concept of microhms can be as elusive as catching a firefly in the dark.

meanings.definition: A measurement of resistance in an electrical circuit.
meanings.sent1: The technician checked the microhm value to ensure proper circuit operation.
meanings.sent2: High microhm readings indicate potential issues in the circuit.
meanings.sent3: The microhm measurement danced around the room, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The resistance in the circuit was as stubborn as a mule in a microhm.
meanings.sent5: Understanding microhms is like trying to grasp a handful of sand slipping through your fingers.
